title: depatched to v7.15? Fix?
body: hi, opened my laptop and the league client to see i could not log cause " i may be offline " this happens the odd time when i first open the client, but now today has depatched me to v7.15. The league webpages were also slow compared to any others.

replies.body: You might be having hiccups with your connection, so our services might be getting cut off when trying to patch or log you in.  Start out with the steps with the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to see if that helps.  Let me know if you continue getting any errors after.
The same thing happened to me.
